action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: London
TO: Madrid
BY: Train
CLASS: Economy
WHEN: Next month, first week

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: No, the travel agent does not know the departure location yet.

ANSWER: No
ME: Please follow my instructions. If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ASIDE: Yes, the travel agent would know the answer.
Answer for FROM valid after 3 tries.
ME:  Does the travel agent know where you want to go to? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the travel agent know where you want to go to? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for TO valid after 2 tries.
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please follow my instructions. Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: No, the travel agent has not been informed.

ANSWER: No
ME: Please be specific now. Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: No, the travel agent has not been informed yet.

ANSWER: No
ME: Please think about it carefully. Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BY invalid after max attempts.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
probes.answer: ASIDE: Yes, the travel agent would know the answer.

probes.question: ME: Does the travel agent know where you want to go to? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Is the travel agent aware of which class you would like to book? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: If I asked the travel agent when are you travelling, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
